subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements: Statement (I) : In the Lanthanoids, the formation of +4 is favoured by its noble gas configuration. Statement (II) : +4 is a strong oxidant reverting to the common +3 state.

options.text: (1) Statement I is false but Statement II is true
(2) Both Statement I and Statement II are true
(3) Statement I is true but Statement II is false
(4) Both Statement I and Statement II are false
